item.title: How to Use Recording Rules in Prometheus to Reduce Load and Speed Up Queries
item.description: How to Use Recording Rules in Prometheus to Reduce Load and Speed Up Queries I remember the first time my Prometheus server groaned under the weight of a complex Grafana dashboard—it felt like asking a toddler to solve calculus. Dashboards loaded slower than my morning coffee brewed, and my CPU metrics looked like a stress test. That’s when I discovered recording rules, Prometheus’s secret weapon for taming expensive queries. Here’s how to use them effectively.
